TopicTitle: Medium stack separator causes craft to become uncontrollable

Articles.Content:
Craft setup:

Stack separator between stages, lower stage has medium remote control unit. On staging, stack separator remains "attached" to lower stage, but shoots off into the distance, the craft then gets locked with both controls and engines not able to change it's orbit or heading. Seems like as the stage separator gets farther away mass becomes infinite, or just really bugs out when it stops rendering.

  • KSP v0.1.1.0
  • Windows 10
  • Nvidia GeForce RTX 3060 TI
  • AMD Ryzen 7 5800X 
  • No mods
Oh additionally when continuing to press the space bar, the craft will add energy to its orbit. Sort of just blinks to being a few kms away from where its facing.
